With CRT:
$ time (echo 1234 | ./encrypt)
input: 0x1234
0x5a5f146435ae7301ce02105abbe6ddef1ab28f81ea7bfc3f80911137851c307f62aef0f048909b1a4332b0e4d1da0e41816eccff033c4fbb972c9e1befb317be5a0305238f6fcf03983b19312f8bdf22bae1b1a9ab30b27870d9c424cb4f481c5f1fbc2562466745ce7f271f76dacd0fcbead0344812cbeb452f7c6f8ac5421c

real    0m1.846s
user    0m1.840s
sys     0m0.000s

Without CRT:
$ time (echo 1234 | ./encrypt)
input: 0x1234
0x5a5f146435ae7301ce02105abbe6ddef1ab28f81ea7bfc3f80911137851c307f62aef0f048909b1a4332b0e4d1da0e41816eccff033c4fbb972c9e1befb317be5a0305238f6fcf03983b19312f8bdf22bae1b1a9ab30b27870d9c424cb4f481c5f1fbc2562466745ce7f271f76dacd0fcbead0344812cbeb452f7c6f8ac5421c

real    0m7.227s
user    0m7.216s
sys     0m0.000s
